mapper.select:
select count(*) from ding_dan dd left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.qyDdztId=ddzt.id left join wu_zi_lei_xing wzlx on dd.qyWzlxId=wzlx.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.qyWzId=wz.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.qyYssId=yss.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.qyFhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_bu_men shbm on dd.qyShbmId=shbm.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.qyDdztId=#{ddztId}
and ddzt.mc=#{ddztMc}
and dd.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yssMc},'%')
and wz.mc like CONCAT('%',#{wzMc},'%')
and fhdw.mc like CONCAT('%',#{fhdwMc},'%')
and shbm.mc like CONCAT('%',#{shbmMc},'%')
and dd.sjxm like CONCAT('%',#{sjxm},'%')
and dd.sjsfzh like CONCAT('%',#{sjsfzh},'%')

select dd.*,ddzt.mc ddztMc,wzlx.mc wzlxMc,wz.mc wzMc,yss.mc yssMc,fhdw.mc fhdwMc,shbm.mc shbmMc from ding_dan dd left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.qyDdztId=ddzt.id left join wu_zi_lei_xing wzlx on dd.qyWzlxId=wzlx.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.qyWzId=wz.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.qyYssId=yss.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.qyFhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_bu_men shbm on dd.qyShbmId=shbm.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.qyDdztId=#{ddztId}
and ddzt.mc=#{ddztMc}
and dd.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yssMc},'%')
and wz.mc like CONCAT('%',#{wzMc},'%')
and fhdw.mc like CONCAT('%',#{fhdwMc},'%')
and shbm.mc like CONCAT('%',#{shbmMc},'%')
and dd.sjxm like CONCAT('%',#{sjxm},'%')
and dd.sjsfzh like CONCAT('%',#{sjsfzh},'%')
order by dd.bjsj desc limit #{rowNum},#{rows}
mapper.insert:
insert into ding_dan
ddh,
qyDdztId,
yjzt, ejzt,
sjsfzh,
sjxm,
cph,
lxlx,
yzxzl,
sjzl,
zlceb,
yfwWzlxId,
qyWzlxId,
yfwWzId,
qyWzId,
yfwYssId,
qyYssId,
yfwFhdwId,
qyFhdwId,
yfwShbmId,
qyShbmId,
bjsj,
ewmlj,
yfwtb
values
#{ddh},
#{qyDdztId},
1, 1,
#{sjsfzh},
#{sjxm},
#{cph},
#{lxlx},
#{yzxzl},
#{sjzl},
#{zlceb},
#{yfwWzlxId},
#{qyWzlxId},
#{yfwWzId},
#{qyWzId},
#{yfwYssId},
#{qyYssId},
#{yfwFhdwId},
#{qyFhdwId},
#{yfwShbmId},
#{qyShbmId},
now(),
#{ewmlj},
${@com.znczQydCs.entity.Main@WEI_TONG_BU}
mapper.update:
update ding_dan set
ddh=#{ddh},
qyDdztId=#{qyDdztId},
yjzt=#{yjzt},
ejzt=#{ejzt},
sjsfzh=#{sjsfzh},
sjxm=#{sjxm},
cph=#{cph},
yjbfh=#{yjbfh},
ejbfh=#{ejbfh},
lxlx=#{lxlx},
yzxzl=#{yzxzl},
sjzl=#{sjzl},
zlceb=#{zlceb},
yfwWzlxId=#{yfwWzlxId},
qyWzlxId=#{qyWzlxId},
yfwWzId=#{yfwWzId},
qyWzId=#{qyWzId},
yfwYssId=#{yfwYssId},
qyYssId=#{qyYssId},
yfwFhdwId=#{yfwFhdwId},
qyFhdwId=#{qyFhdwId},
yfwShbmId=#{yfwShbmId},
qyShbmId=#{qyShbmId},
bjsj=now(), yfwtb=${@com.znczQydCs.entity.Main@WEI_TONG_BU}
where id=#{id}

update ding_dan set
ddh=#{ddh},
ddztId=#{xddztId},
yjzt=#{xyjzt},
ejzt=#{xejzt},
sjsfzh=#{sjsfzh},
sjxm=#{sjxm},
cph=#{cph},
lxlx=#{lxlx},
yzxzl=#{yzxzl},
sjzl=#{sjzl},
zlceb=#{zlceb},
wzlxId=#{wzlxId},
wzId=#{wzId},
yssId=#{yssId},
fhdwId=#{fhdwId},
shbmId=#{shbmId},
bjsj=now()
where ddztId=#{ddztId}
and yjbfh=#{yjbfh}
and ejbfh=#{ejbfh}
and yjzt=#{yjzt}
and ejzt=#{ejzt}
mapper.select: select * from ding_dan where ddztId=#{ddztId} and cph=#{cph}
select count(*) from ding_dan where ddh=#{ddh}
select count(*) from ding_dan dd,ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt where dd.qyDdztId=ddzt.id and dd.yjbfh=#{yjbfh} and dd.ejbfh=#{ejbfh} and ddzt.mc=#{ddztMc} and dd.yjzt=#{yjzt} and dd.ejzt=#{ejzt}
select * from ding_dan where id in (select rcjl.ddId from(select ddId from rglr_cph_ji_lu where cph=#{cph} order by lrsj desc LIMIT 0,1)as rcjl)
select id from ding_dan where ddh=#{ddh}
select count(*) from ding_dan where id=#{id} and cph=#{cph}
select count(*) from ding_dan where ddh like CONCAT(#{ddhDate},'%')
mapper.update: update ding_dan set yfwtb=#{xtbzt} where yfwtb=#{yfwtb}
